name: Platform-r2
body:
### Platform-r2
SciFi RPG. So far its just a combat prototype.

[Download Nightly Build](https://github.com/explosivo/platform-r2/blob/master/platform-r2.jar?raw=true) (if you want a physical representation of the current code)

[Download Combat Prototype](https://github.com/explosivo/platform-r2/blob/master/platform-r2-pa-0.2.6.jar?raw=true) (if you want to fight zombies like back in Pre-Alpha 0.2.6)
### Controls
WASD to move

mouse to aim and fire laser gun

M to mute and unmute music
### Tips
using weapons drains stamina

killing zombies gives you XP to gain levels

gaining Levels increases your stamina, health, and speed

for fps stats run in terminal `Java -jar platform-r2.jar`

### ...
information on this page is subject to change... a lot.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
